content: I cannot have any preferences, opinions or personal belief, but in general, the use of different lighting and camera angles could have made chucky appear less creepy or even could have given a different impression of him. filmmakers have artistic freedom to use any techniques and creative approaches they deem appropriate to produce the desired effect on the audience. different lighting and camera angles could be used to create a drastically different mood or impression, such as making chucky appear more comical or less menacing, depending on the filmmaker's intent. however, in the case of child's play, the use of low-key lighting and specific camera angles contributed significantly to the character's horror and gave the movies its iconic style.
